QuestData.Title: Imprisoned Inquisitor
QuestData.Description: This report states that the Legion seeks to free an imprisoned Legion inquisitor called Raalgar, a demon from here on Argus who cannot be killed because of a secret magic he alone possesses. $b$bBecause of his immortality, he is held in the Arcatraz in Tempest Keep.$b$bThe Light Mother told us of that naaru stronghold, but I've never set eyes upon it myself, $n. Turalyon mentioned the Vindicaar has some connection to Tempest Keep. Perhaps your ship's engineer knows more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Vindicaar and ask Grand Artificer Romuul about High Inquisitor Raalgar.
QuestData.RewardText: High Inquisitor Raalgar? A fearsome creature but he has been held securely in the Arcatraz at Tempest Keep for a very long time. $b$bIf the Legion plans to free him then they must know that he is particularly dangerous to us.
